author: Ingrid Miley
title: Govt employees told to work from home, avoid contact
description: Government employees should only attend their normal workplaces where organisations deem it to be essential that they should work on site, according to the latest guidelines for managers issued by the Department of Public Expenditure and Reform.
content:
Government employees should only attend their normal workplaces where organisations deem it to be essential that they should work on site, according to the latest guidelines for managers issued by the Department of Public Expenditure and Reform.
